title: Claimed
description: In the midst of a power struggle for vampire king, it soon becomes clear to Anthony that the only way to protect a fragile human in his care is to claim her as his mate. Meanwhile, his deepest wish is to have his lover awakened from the memory loss that took everything... not just the memories he meant to erase.Blood Lust (book 1) (Kept, Claimed, Mated)Save My Soul (book 2)The Catalyst (book 3)Life Cycle (book 4)Cat FightDark Mercy
author: Zoe Winters
